title: You can now disable all AI features in Zed
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Finally, Zed lets you turn off AI because who needs another thing to nag you about productivity?

title: Cops say criminals use a Google Pixel with GrapheneOS – I say that's freedom
author: pabs3
aiHeadline: Cops are worried criminals are using GrapheneOS on Pixel phones—because nothing says 'I'm a bad guy' like using the most secure OS available.

title: CARA – High precision robot dog using rope
author: hakonjdjohnsen
aiHeadline: Meet CARA, the robot dog that proves even machines need a leash to be useful.

title: Cerebras launches Qwen3-235B, achieving 1.5k tokens per second
author: mihau
aiHeadline: Cerebras just released a new AI model that's so fast, it can process 1.5k tokens per second—because who needs sleep when you can just think faster?

title: I made Tinder but it's only pictures of my wife and I can only swipe right
author: risquer
aiHeadline: Tinder but only for your spouse—because why date the world when you've already found your match?
